tool_description: Aggregates classified feedback data to generate summary statistics, trends, and insights across different classification dimensions.

aggregation_level.description: Level of aggregation: summary, detailed, or comprehensive

include_percentages.description: Whether to include percentage calculations in results

error_messages: Mismatched array lengths: All classification arrays must have the same length as feedback_ids.
Empty classification data: At least one classification array must contain valid data.
Unsupported aggregation level: Use summary, detailed, or comprehensive.
Aggregation failed: Unable to aggregate classification data.
usage: Provide feedback_ids and all classification arrays from validated results. Set aggregation_level and include_percentages as needed. Returns aggregated statistics and insights.

total_feedback_count.description: Total number of feedback records processed

topic_distribution.description: Distribution of feedback across topic categories

product_distribution.description: Distribution of feedback across product categories

service_distribution.description: Distribution of feedback across service areas

issue_distribution.description: Distribution of feedback across issue types
